author: Justin Worland
title: American Farmers Were Already Hurting. Now the Coronavirus Slowdown Might Do Them In
description: American farmers were optimistic at the beginning of the year, but coronavirus has created huge uncertainty
content: For many Americans in the agricultural sector, like Monte Peterson, a corn and soybean farmer in North Dakota, the last few years have been tough. A trade war with China isolated farmers from one of their biggest markets, a growing debt crunch strained many o… [+7145 chars]
